outputs.output_descr: The program preparation grant will be used to develop the full scale program on sustainable land management in the shire river basin. This will be accomplished through the recruitment of two sets of consultants; local and international consultants who will conduct consultations with stakeholders including government, the private sector and development partners in order to further refine the project activities and come up with key deliverables.

The program preparation grant will be used to develop the full scale program on sustainable land management in the shire river basin. This will be accomplished through the recruitment of two sets of consultants; local and international consultants who will conduct consultations with stakeholders including government, the private sector and development partners in order to further refine the project activities and come up with key deliverables.

project_title: PIMS 2085 Pvt Pub Prt for SLM in the Shire river
